title: Athletism — Striking (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Base Conditioning
equipment: Heavy bag, pads, focus mitts, kick shield
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Protective gear (gloves, wraps, shin guards, mouthpiece)
goal: Restore movement quality, aerobic base, technical reset of stance/guard.

main: Bag work: 6x2' light combos, focus guard/footwork
cooldown: Soft tissue release 10' (foam roll, lacrosse ball)

notes: Week 1: Z2 conditioning 30–40'. Week 2: +10% volume; technique density ↑.
